data.title: The Newest Christmas Classic Contender!
data.meta_description: The new musical movie, Journey to Bethlehem, which is set to hit theaters on November 10, 2023, is destined to be the newest Christmas classic contender.
data.text:
Introduction:

The new musical movie, Journey to Bethlehem, which is set to hit theaters on November 10, 2023, is destined to be the newest Christmas classic contender. Co-writer of the movie, Nikki Anders, an award-winning recording artist, and songwriter, shares with us more about how the greatest story ever comes alive and the importance of creating content that the whole family can enjoy together.

The Newest Christmas Classic Contender:

Journey to Bethlehem is a musical retelling of the Christmas story in a fresh and inspiring way. This unique take on the age-old story offers a different perspective and connects with the hearts of the viewers. It’s a project that has been 17 years in the making, a labor of love from a family who wanted to create something meaningful for the holiday season.

Starring Fiona Palomo, Milo Manheim, Joel Smallbone, Lecrae, and Academy-Award Nominee Antonio Banderas

Nikki Anders – A Multi-Talented Artist:

Nikki Anders is a multi-talented artist with a diverse background in the music industry. She has worked as a recording artist, songwriter, producer, and music publishing company owner. Her impressive resume includes collaborations with major motion pictures and television shows, such as Glee, The Glee Project, High School Musical 3, Cheetah Girls, and many more. Most recently, she dedicated her time to the Golden Globe-winning TV series, Glee.

Nikki’s Secret Weapon in Glee:

Nikki shared an interesting insight into her role in Glee. She served as the secret weapon for music producer Adam Anders by recording demos for lead actress Lea Michele. Her voice helped the cast members save time and effort by emulating her singing, making the music production process smoother.

The Journey to Bethlehem Project:

The idea for Journey to Bethlehem was born 17 years ago when Nikki and her husband recognized the lack of Christmas movies with music. They wanted to create a film that told the story of Christmas through a musical lens, and it is in fact the first musical recounting Mary and Joseph’s journey. Over the years, they worked on the project in between their busy careers. It wasn’t until COVID gave them the time to fully dedicate themselves to the film that the project started coming to life.

Importance of Patience and Trusting God’s Plan:

Nikki highlighted the importance of patience and embracing God’s plan in our lives. The film’s theme reflects the idea that we may have our dreams and plans, but sometimes God hits the pause button. Learning to wait and trust in God’s perfect timing is a significant takeaway from Journey to Bethlehem.

Depicting Mary and Joseph as Real Humans:

One of the unique aspects of Journey to Bethlehem is the portrayal of Mary and Joseph as real, relatable humans. The film explores their emotions, struggles, and the choices they made in the midst of a life-altering event. It emphasizes the significance of their relationship and the love that grew between them during their extraordinary journey.

Connecting with the Audience:

Nikki shared how the movie connects with the audience on various emotional levels. The film takes viewers through a range of emotions, from joy and laughter to moments of gravity and reflection. The goal was to ensure that every member of the family could engage with the story and experience the true meaning of Christmas.

The Impact on Families:

Journey to Bethlehem aims to be a family-friendly movie that people can enjoy together. Nikki emphasized the importance of families making time to watch and create memories together, and she hopes the movie becomes a cherished tradition for many. The film caters to both boys and girls, making it an inclusive and heartwarming experience for all.

Where to Find More Information:

To learn more about Journey to Bethlehem, visit the official website: journeytobethlehemmovie.com. The website provides resources for families, including coloring pages, videos, and options to pre-buy or gift tickets to those in need. The film’s creators hope that families will make the most of the holiday season by watching this heartwarming musical, which is sure to become the newest Christmas classic contender.

Conclusion:

Journey to Bethlehem is a unique and heartwarming Christmas musical that brings a fresh perspective to the timeless story of Mary and Joseph’s journey. Through our conversation with co-writer Nikki Anders, we’ve discovered the passion and dedication that went into making this film a reality. It’s a movie that the whole family can enjoy together and create cherished memories for years to come.
